title: 2014 - The Year In Christian Music (Bundle 65)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2014 - THE YEAR IN CHRISTIAN MUSIC
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Now that the year is winding down, I want to start directing a little more of my focus on filling in some holes.  So if there were any previous released albums from 2014, albums you may have been hoping for, and albums that I've not yet shared in these first 65 bundles, please let me know.  I'll add them to a list and try to start tracking some of them down for you.

POP: Abandon, Group1Crew, Shuree, TobyMac, Various, Virtue.  PRAISE & WORSHIP: Abandon, Catalyst Worship, Newsboys, The Pursuit, Shantelle Hawkins.  ROCK: The Brave, Two Dragons.  CONTEMPORARY: Epic Season, Hannah Stenman.  HIP-HOP/RAP: Jackie Hill Perry, Japhia Life, Social Club, Xavier Sorrow.  SINGER-SONGWRITER: Karl Nicholls.  GOSPEL: Mary Hampton, Meachum L Clarke And True Purpose, Swan Silvertones.  HARDCORE/METAL: Timoratus, Type A Alert.

We have shared 2,174 releases this year.  Praise God!

You can choose from these 25 releases today...

 * Abandon - 2014 - Love Prevails
 * Arise Music - 2014 - Arise 2014 EP
 * Brave, The - 2014 - Rise
 * Catalyst Worship - 2014 - Reconciled His Glory Known
 * Epic Season - 2014 - New Lands
 * Group1Crew - 2014 - Stronger EP
 * Hannah Stenman - 2014 - Seek The Lord EP
 * Jackie Hill Perry - 2014 - Art Of Joy
 * Japhia Life - 2014 - The Profit
 * Karl Nicholls - 2014 - The Dave Sessions
 * Mary Hampton - 2014 - Unstoppable
 * Meachum L Clarke And True Purpose - 2014 - Greater
 * Newsboys - 2014 - Hallelujah For The Cross
 * Pursuit, The - 2014 - The Pursuit
 * Shantelle Hawkins - 2014 - In Pursuit Of His Presence
 * Shuree - 2014 - Be The Change EP
 * Social Club - 2014 - Waiting - Single
 * Swan Silvertones - 2014 - Timeless Gospel Classics, Vol 6
 * Timoratus - 2014 - Death EP
 * TobyMac - 2014 - Eye'M All Mixed Up Remixes
 * Two Dragons - 2014 - Where Will We Go
 * Type A Alert - 2014 - Into Depths First Light
 * Various - 2014 - Reverence - An Offering
 * Virtue - 2014 - You Are - Single
 * Xavier Sorrow - 2014 - Work - Single

Blessings,
TorrentTracts, November 2014
